title: Kugelhopf with Rum and Eggnog
ingredients: ['150g currants', '3 tablespoons rum', '250ml eggnog', '480g bread flour, divided', '2 1/2 teaspoons dried fast acting yeast', '100g caster sugar', '225g butter', '3 eggs', '1/2 teaspoon salt', '1/2 teaspoon ground cinnamon', '25g flaked almonds, for garnish', '2 tablespoons icing sugar, for dusting']
